column5: Looking for a specific bottom bouncer, the one that snaps onto a weight snap, I think it is called Lite Bite. Can't seem to find them at my local places. Any help would be appreciated.
check out www.reelbait.comhere is the link to the bottom bouncershttp://www.reelbait.com/prod_list.ph...t=336&prod=337
this outfit carries lite bites. you can call or email to get a catalog. http://www.dakotamart.com/
